$BTC currently trading at $84,734.34, showing a minor 0.58% dip over the last 24 hours. BTC recently rebounded from a local low of $74,508, pushing back toward resistance near $88,700. This consolidation phase, marked by mixed volume and alternating green/red candles, signals uncertainty, but also opportunity for active traders. Meanwhile DARK has officially launched on BingX, now available on both Spot and Perpetual Futures markets. This comes at a pivotal time in the crypto market. Adding to the mix, #China is reportedly offloading 194,000 #BTC (worth $16B+), which could inject short-term volatility into the broader crypto market. With DARK just entering price discovery and #BITCOIN in a crucial holding pattern, this could be a prime moment to catch early market momentum. Plus, BingX is offering up to 6,000+ USDT in rewards for new users. Watch closely, Trade wisely as Volatility can be equal to opportunity.

üß© Building Crypto Liquidity: Best Market Making Programs in 2025




The primary role of market makers in crypto is to enhance liquidity - a key factor in stabilizing prices and narrowing the bid-ask spread for assets like $BTC. Let‚Äôs explore why liquidity matters and highlight top market-making programs across leading exchanges.




ü§î What is needed to form proper liquidity in the market?

For a market to function properly, it needs a balanced mix of participants - like a LEGO structure:

üìç Market makers are the "large blocks" - provide the foundation and stability.

üìç Retail traders are the "small pieces" - drive organic flow and activity.

A complete structure is only possible when both are working together.




Where to find this "quality liquidity"?üöÄ

Based on this balanced LEGO structure, I‚Äôve identified some of the best MM programs that, in my view, offer the best conditions for liquidity providers:

üìç WhiteBIT –æffers special conditions for market makers, algorithmic traders and arbitrageurs. Fees can go as low as - 0.012% for makers and 0.020% for takers in Spot, and - 0.012% for makers and 0.025% for takers in Futures.

üìç Bybit offers rebates up to - 0.005% for both Spot and Derivatives trading. Market makers also enjoy exclusive fee discounts and access to institutional loans.




üåç Hank Huang, CEO of Kronos Research, shared his perspective how MM programs actually ensure liquidity:

"Imagine the market as a LEGO city. Market makers and institutions are the large foundation blocks constructing the bridges, skyscrapers, and core infrastructure that give the city its strength and stability. Retail traders are the smaller bricks, the minifigures, and decorative elements adding color, character, and constant motion. Without market makers, the entire structure risks collapse. Without retail, the city loses its soul becoming a lifeless, empty shell. It‚Äôs the harmony of all pieces big and small that brings the city to life and keeps it thriving."

#BTC #Macro Insights# #BTC Price Analysis# #Meme Alpha#

Inflation is the perfect crime.




No guns. No threats. Just a printing press and your silence. They flood the system with trillions, not to help you, but to fund political vanity projects and buy applause with borrowed money.




Meanwhile, your rent doubles. Your groceries bleed you dry. And your savings? Worth less every single day.

You work. You budget. You grind. They spend like drunken kings, then steal the difference by weakening your money.




And if anyone dares say, ‚ÄúMaybe we should stop setting money on fire‚Ä¶‚Äù they‚Äôre smeared as heartless, evil‚ÄîHitler with a calculator.




They fight tooth and nail to protect their right to waste.

Because cutting spending means cutting power. And they‚Äôd rather destroy the dollar than let go of control.




So here‚Äôs the truth:




You‚Äôre not falling behind because you‚Äôre lazy. You‚Äôre falling behind because they rigged the system to make you poorer. At the same time, they get richer, louder, and more untouchable.




This isn‚Äôt policy. It‚Äôs plunder. And inflation is their weapon of choice.




And here‚Äôs what they don‚Äôt tell you:




Inflation never resets. It compounds. Prices don‚Äôt drop back down. Your rent doesn‚Äôt rewind. The damage sticks, and it stacks, year after year.




So even if inflation ‚Äúslows,‚Äù you‚Äôre still stuck paying more forever for what used to cost less.




Wake up. They‚Äôre not saving you. They‚Äôre strip-mining your future to fund their delusions.

$BT




#BTC #Macro Insights# #BTC Price Analysis# #Metaplanet#

The problem with the world today is that intelligent people are often filled with doubts, not because they are wrong, but because they understand the complexities of various issues.




On the other hand, those who lack understanding are often overly confident, and their certainty is frequently mistaken for wisdom.




Social media amplifies this problem, rewarding boldness over thoughtfulness, which makes false confidence appear as truth on a massive scale.




As a result, we find ourselves in a cycle where individuals with limited knowledge overestimate their competence, while their messages are amplified.




In contrast, true experts, who are aware of the complexities involved, allow for error and flexibility. This trait contributes to their expertise but often leads to their messages being diminished in comparison.

$BTC
